Luzon.name: National Museum of Fine Arts
Luzon.hours: Open Tuesday to Sunday, 10:00 AM to 5:00 PM
Luzon.description: The National Museum of Fine Arts houses a extensive collection of Philippine art, including paintings, sculptures, and other works by renowned Filipino artists.

Luzon.name: National Museum of Anthropology
Luzon.hours: Open Tuesday to Sunday, 10:00 AM to 5:00 PM
Luzon.description: The National Museum of Anthropology showcases the diverse cultures, traditions, and heritage of the Philippine archipelago.

Luzon.name: National Museum of Natural History
Luzon.hours: Open Tuesday to Sunday, 10:00 AM to 5:00 PM
Luzon.description: The National Museum of Natural History features exhibits on the Philippines' rich biodiversity, geological formations, and natural history.

Luzon.name: Ayala Museum
Luzon.hours: Open Tuesday to Sunday, 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM
Luzon.description: The Ayala Museum is a private museum that showcases Filipino art, history, and culture through its permanent and temporary exhibitions.

Luzon.name: The Mind Museum
Luzon.hours: Open Tuesday to Sunday, 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM
Luzon.description: The Mind Museum is an interactive science museum that aims to inspire curiosity and foster learning about science, technology, and the natural world.

Luzon.name: Museum of Contemporary Art and Design (MCAD)
Luzon.hours: Open Tuesday to Sunday, 10:00 AM to 6:00 PM
Luzon.description: The Museum of Contemporary Art and Design is dedicated to showcasing and promoting contemporary art and design from the Philippines and around the world.

Luzon.name: Metropolitan Museum of Manila
Luzon.hours: Open Tuesday to Sunday, 10:00 AM to 6:00 PM
Luzon.description: The Metropolitan Museum of Manila is a premier art museum that features a diverse collection of Philippine art, ranging from traditional to contemporary works.

Luzon.name: Yuchengco Museum
Luzon.hours: Open Tuesday to Sunday, 10:00 AM to 6:00 PM
Luzon.description: The Yuchengco Museum is a private museum that highlights the art, culture, and heritage of the Philippines, with a focus on the contributions of the Yuchengco family.

Luzon.name: San Agustin Museum
Luzon.hours: Open Tuesday to Sunday, 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM
Luzon.description: The San Agustin Museum is located within the historic San Agustin Church, showcasing religious artifacts, art, and the rich history of the Augustinian order in the Philippines.

Luzon.name: BenCab Museum
Luzon.hours: Open Tuesday to Sunday, 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM
Luzon.description: The BenCab Museum houses the works of National Artist Benedicto Cabrera, as well as a collection of indigenous artifacts and contemporary Philippine art.

Luzon.name: Museo Ilocos Norte, Laoag
Luzon.hours: Open Tuesday to Sunday, 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM
Luzon.description: The Museo Ilocos Norte showcases the history, culture, and traditions of the Ilocos Norte province.

Luzon.name: BenCab Museum, Baguio
Luzon.hours: Open Tuesday to Sunday, 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM
Luzon.description: The BenCab Museum features the works of renowned Filipino artist Benedicto "BenCab" Cabrera, as well as other contemporary Filipino art.

Luzon.name: Baguio Museum, Baguio
Luzon.hours: Open Tuesday to Sunday, 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM
Luzon.description: The Baguio Museum highlights the history, culture, and natural wonders of Baguio City and the Cordillera region.

Luzon.name: Museo de Baler, Aurora
Luzon.hours: Open Tuesday to Sunday, 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM
Luzon.description: The Museo de Baler showcases the rich history and cultural heritage of Baler, a municipality known for its surfing and as the birthplace of Philippine national hero, Manuel L. Quezon.

Luzon.name: Casa Manila, Intramuros
Luzon.hours: Open Tuesday to Sunday, 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM
Luzon.description: Casa Manila is a museum that recreates a 19th-century Spanish colonial house, providing visitors with a glimpse into the lifestyle and architecture of the Intramuros district during the Spanish era.

Luzon.name: Clark Museum and 4D Theater
Luzon.location: S. Osmena Street, Clark Freeport Zone, Angeles City, Luzon
Luzon.hours: Tuesday to Sunday, 9:00 AM to 4:00 PM
Luzon.description: The interactive Clark Museum showcases the Filipino spirit of bravery, industry, and ingenuity across 4 galleries. The 4D Theater features a documentary film highlighting Clark's rich history.

Luzon.name: Apolinario Mabini Shrine
Luzon.hours: Open Tuesday to Sunday, closed on public holidays
Luzon.description: The Apolinario Mabini Shrine is a historic site in Santa Mesa, Manila, noted for being the residence of Filipino military leader Apolinario Mabini.

Luzon.name: Museo de Intramuros
Luzon.hours: Open Tuesday to Sunday, 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM
Luzon.description: The Museo de Intramuros is located within the historic walled city of Intramuros in Manila. It features religious art and artifacts from the Spanish colonial period.

Luzon.name: Pinto Art Museum
Luzon.location: 1 Sierra Madre Street, Grand Heights Subdivision, Antipolo City, Rizal
Luzon.hours: Open Tuesday to Sunday, 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM
Luzon.description: Pinto Art Museum is a private contemporary art museum located in Antipolo City, Rizal. It showcases modern and contemporary Philippine art.

Luzon.name: The Mind Museum
Luzon.location: J.Y. Campos Park, 3rd Avenue, Bonifacio Global City, Taguig
Luzon.hours: Open Tuesday to Sunday, 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM
Luzon.description: The Mind Museum is a science museum in Taguig, Metro Manila, featuring interactive exhibits about science, technology, and the natural world.

Visayas.name: The Negros Museum
Visayas.hours: Open Tuesday to Sunday, 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM
Visayas.description: The Negros Museum showcases the rich cultural heritage of Negros Island, with exhibits highlighting the island's history, arts, and traditions.

Visayas.name: Bohol National Museum
Visayas.hours: Open Tuesday to Sunday, 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM
Visayas.description: The Bohol National Museum features exhibits on the natural history, archaeology, and ethnography of the Bohol province.

Visayas.name: National Museum of the Philippines â€“ Cebu
Visayas.hours: Open Tuesday to Sunday, 10:00 AM to 5:00 PM
Visayas.description: The Cebu branch of the National Museum of the Philippines showcases the art, history, and cultural treasures of the Visayas region.

Visayas.name: Iloilo Museum of Contemporary Art
Visayas.hours: Open Tuesday to Sunday, 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM
Visayas.description: The Iloilo Museum of Contemporary Art features exhibitions and installations by contemporary Filipino artists.

Visayas.name: Rizal Memorial Library and Museum
Visayas.hours: Open Tuesday to Sunday, 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM
Visayas.description: The Rizal Memorial Library and Museum houses a collection of memorabilia and artifacts related to the life and legacy of national hero Dr. Jose Rizal.

Visayas.name: University of San Carlos Museum
Visayas.hours: Open Tuesday to Saturday, 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM
Visayas.description: The University of San Carlos Museum features exhibits on the natural sciences, archaeology, and ethnography of the Visayas region.

Visayas.name: Gabaldon Building Museum
Visayas.hours: Open Tuesday to Sunday, 10:00 AM to 6:00 PM
Visayas.description: The Gabaldon Building Museum is housed in a historic Spanish colonial-era structure and showcases the architecture and history of the region.

Visayas.name: Negros Occidental Provincial Capitol and Museum
Visayas.hours: Open Monday to Friday, 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM
Visayas.description: The Negros Occidental Provincial Capitol and Museum features exhibits on the history, culture, and governance of the province.

Visayas.name: Patnongon Museum
Visayas.hours: Open Tuesday to Sunday, 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM
Visayas.description: The Patnongon Museum showcases the indigenous arts, crafts, and traditions of the Antique province.

Visayas.name: Silliman University Anthropology Museum
Visayas.hours: Open Monday to Friday, 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM
Visayas.description: The Silliman University Anthropology Museum features exhibits on the cultural diversity and heritage of the Visayas region.

Visayas.name: Santa Barbara Centennial Museum
Visayas.hours: Open Tuesday to Sunday, 10:00 AM to 6:00 PM
Visayas.description: The Santa Barbara Centennial Museum celebrates the history and cultural legacy of the Santa Barbara municipality in Iloilo.

Visayas.name: Boljoon Parish Museum
Visayas.hours: Open Tuesday to Sunday, 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM
Visayas.description: The Boljoon Parish Museum showcases the religious art, artifacts, and history of the Boljoon Parish, one of the oldest Catholic churches in the Philippines.

Visayas.name: University of the Philippines Visayas Museum of Natural Sciences
Visayas.hours: Open Monday to Friday, 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM
Visayas.description: The University of the Philippines Visayas Museum of Natural Sciences features exhibits on the natural history and biodiversity of the Visayas region.

Mindanao.name: D' Bone Collector Museum
Mindanao.hours: Open Tuesday to Sunday, 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM
Mindanao.description: The D' Bone Collector Museum houses an extensive collection of skeletons and fossils, showcasing the diversity of the Philippines' flora and fauna.

Mindanao.name: Museo Dabawenyo
Mindanao.hours: Open Tuesday to Sunday, 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM
Mindanao.description: The Museo Dabawenyo is a regional museum that highlights the history, culture, and traditions of the Davao region.

Mindanao.name: Battle of Surigao Strait Museum
Mindanao.hours: Open Tuesday to Sunday, 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM
Mindanao.description: The Battle of Surigao Strait Museum commemorates the historic naval battle that took place during World War II in the waters off Surigao Strait.

Mindanao.name: Agusan Museum
Mindanao.hours: Open Tuesday to Sunday, 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM
Mindanao.description: The Agusan Museum showcases the rich cultural heritage and history of the Agusan province, including its indigenous communities and archaeological findings.

Mindanao.name: Xavier University Museum (Museo de Oro)
Mindanao.hours: Open Monday to Saturday, 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM
Mindanao.description: The Xavier University Museum, also known as the Museo de Oro, houses a collection of pre-Hispanic gold artifacts and other cultural treasures from the Mindanao region.

Mindanao.name: Zamboanga City Museum (Fort Pilar)
Mindanao.hours: Open Tuesday to Sunday, 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM
Mindanao.description: The Zamboanga City Museum is located within the historic Fort Pilar and showcases the city's Spanish colonial heritage, as well as its diverse cultural influences.

Mindanao.name: Moncado White House
Mindanao.hours: Open Tuesday to Sunday, 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM
Mindanao.description: The Moncado White House is a museum that highlights the history and culture of the Maranao people, featuring traditional architecture, artifacts, and crafts.

Mindanao.name: Butuan National Museum
Mindanao.hours: Open Tuesday to Sunday, 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM
Mindanao.description: The Butuan National Museum is a branch of the National Museum of the Philippines, showcasing the rich archaeological and cultural heritage of the Caraga region.

Mindanao.name: Museum of Three Cultures
Mindanao.hours: Open Monday to Friday, 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM
Mindanao.description: The Museum of Three Cultures showcases the harmonious coexistence of the Maguindanao, Christian, and Indigenous peoples of the region through artifacts and exhibits.

Mindanao.name: Lake Sebu Tribal Museum
Mindanao.hours: Open Monday to Saturday, 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM
Mindanao.description: The Lake Sebu Tribal Museum celebrates the indigenous T'boli culture through traditional artifacts, crafts, and exhibits.
